participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, with a love for hobbies and personal growth.
participant_1.background: I like to drive my Honda around, but I have to be careful not to get stung by bees. I have three pets. I used to be in the marines. I do yoga three times a week. I would love to learn how to make my own clothes.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Passionate and vibrant, I thrive in social situations and cherish meaningful experiences.
participant_2.background: I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life. My phone will be out and ready to capture the best moments at the festival this weekend! I am a Canadian who loves basketball, vintage clothing and my home. I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee. I own a mansion that I do not live in.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do on the weekend?
I love to go to festivals and take pictures!  What about you?
I usually do yoga, or hang out with my pets, but I'd love to learn how to make my own clothes.
That's awesome! I love coffee, and I like to wake up to the smell of it brewing.
I love coffee too! I have a Honda and I have to be careful not to get stung by bees when I drive it.
Oh, that's so interesting! I'm Canadian, and I love basketball, vintage clothing, and my home.
What do you do in the military?
I used to be in the Marines, but now I'm a stay-at-home mom.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying your time at home.
